description: Comprehensive astrological profile data for all individuals sharing the same Sun sign. This data is sign-specific and can be cached globally.

dates.description: Date range when the Sun transits this sign (Note: Birth time may affect exact cusps)

glyph.description: Unicode astrological glyph for the sign

modality.description: The sign's mode of expression and action style

polarity.description: Energetic polarity - extroverted or introverted orientation

ruling_planet.description: The planet that governs this sign

ruling_planet_glyph.description: Unicode glyph for the ruling planet

exaltation.description: Planet that expresses most powerfully in this sign

detriment.description: Planet that faces challenges in this sign

fall.description: Planet at its weakest expression in this sign

body_parts_ruled.description: Physical body areas associated with and governed by this sign

colors.description: Colors that resonate with this sign's energy

gemstones.description: Crystals and stones aligned with the sign

metal.description: Metal associated with the sign's energy

day_of_week.description: Day of the week ruled by this sign's planet

lucky_numbers.description: Numbers that carry favorable energy for this sign

keywords.description: Core descriptive keywords capturing the sign's essence

positive_traits.description: Constructive qualities and strengths naturally expressed by this sign

shadow_traits.description: Challenging patterns and underdeveloped expressions of the sign's energy (when unintegrated)

life_lesson.example: To balance self-assertion with consideration for others; to direct courage toward worthy causes rather than reckless action.
life_lesson.description: Primary evolutionary lesson this sign is here to learn

evolutionary_goal.example: Developing patience, strategic thinking, and completing what is started before charging into the next adventure.
evolutionary_goal.description: Highest expression and developmental aim for this sign

mythology.example: Aries is associated with the Golden Ram of Greek mythology, whose fleece was sought by Jason and the Argonauts. The ram represents courage, sacrifice, and the initiation of great quests.
mythology.description: Mythological stories and archetypes connected to this sign

seasonal_association.example: Spring Equinox - new beginnings, emergence, awakening of nature's energy after winter dormancy.
seasonal_association.description: Connection to natural cycles and seasonal energies in the Northern Hemisphere

archetypal_roles.description: Universal archetypal patterns embodied by this sign

strengths.example: High energy, fast recovery, athletic constitution, strong vitality
strengths.description: Natural health advantages for this sign

vulnerabilities.example: Headaches, eye strain, accidents from haste, inflammation, burns, fevers
vulnerabilities.description: Physical areas requiring attention and care

wellness_advice.example: Channel excess energy through regular exercise, practice patience to avoid injuries, manage stress to prevent inflammation. For health concerns, consult qualified healthcare providers.
wellness_advice.description: Guidance for maintaining optimal health (informational only, not medical advice)

compatibility_overview.description: Relationship compatibility is multifaceted—consider your full birth chart (Moon sign, Rising sign, Venus/Mars placements) alongside Sun sign. These are general solar patterns.

same_sign.example: Natural understanding of motivations; can mirror strengths or amplify weaknesses depending on maturity levels

example.reason: Shared fire element, mutual admiration, exciting partnership

most_compatible.description: Signs with natural harmony and ease

example.reason: Emotional sensitivity vs. directness clash; requires conscious communication

challenging.description: Signs requiring extra effort and understanding

example.reason: Opposite sign teaches balance, diplomacy, consideration; catalyzes personal evolution

growth_oriented.description: Signs that catalyze personal evolution through complementary differences

summary.example: Aries is a dynamic and courageous fire sign known for its leadership, enthusiasm, and pioneering spirit. Those born under this sign are natural initiators who thrive on action and adventure. While their impulsive nature can lead to challenges, Aries individuals are here to learn patience and strategic thinking. With their bold energy and fearless approach, they inspire others to embrace life with passion and authenticity.
summary.description: Concise overview capturing the essence of the sign

style.description: How this sign approaches romantic relationships

gives.description: What this sign brings to partnerships

challenges.example: Boredom with routine, need for constant novelty, impatience with emotional processing

attracts.example: Confident, independent partners who can keep up with their pace
attracts.description: Type of partners naturally drawn to this sign

communication_style.example: Direct and candid; may need to practice active listening and emotional validation
communication_style.description: How this sign communicates with partners

friendship_style.example: Loyal and protective, initiates adventures, prefers action to deep conversation
friendship_style.description: How this sign shows up in platonic relationships

parenting_style.example: Encouraging independence, teaching bravery, may be impatient with slow development

childhood_needs.example: Physical activity, challenges, independence, quick responses to requests
childhood_needs.description: What this sign needed as a child

family_role.example: The protector, the one who takes action in crisis, the motivator

sibling_dynamics.example: Often takes leadership role; may be competitive or protective depending on birth order
sibling_dynamics.description: How this sign relates to siblings

career_strengths.description: Professional domains where this sign naturally excels

work_style.example: Self-directed, fast-paced, prefers leadership roles, thrives under pressure
work_style.description: How this sign approaches daily work

leadership_approach.example: Lead from the front, inspire through action, decisive and direct

ideal_work_environment.example: Dynamic, competitive, autonomy-granting, with clear goals and quick results

growth_area.example: Follow-through on long-term projects; delegating rather than abandoning; team collaboration

growth_path.example: Learning patience, developing follow-through, balancing self-focus with empathy

healing_modalities.description: Therapeutic approaches aligned with this sign

stress_triggers.example: Feeling controlled, slow progress, lack of autonomy, boredom

stress_relief_practices.example: Physical challenges, solo adventures, competitive activities, clearing space quickly

mindfulness_approach.example: Active meditation (walking meditation, running, tai chi); present-moment awareness through movement
mindfulness_approach.description: Meditation and presence practices suited to this sign's nature

money_mindset.example: Money is freedom to act; views wealth as fuel for adventures and new starts

earning_style.example: Entrepreneurial, prefers commission/performance-based income, takes calculated financial risks

spending_patterns.example: Impulsive purchases, invests in experiences and new ventures, generous but not saving-focused

abundance_lesson.example: Building financial stamina and long-term reserves; finishing financial projects before starting new ones; delayed gratification

financial_advisory_note.example: Consult with qualified financial advisors for personalized guidance

spiritual_path.example: The warrior's path - courage, self-discovery through action, leading by example
spiritual_path.description: Natural approach to meaning and transcendence

soul_mission.example: To initiate, to pioneer new frontiers, to embody courageous authenticity

connection_to_divine.example: Through action, courage in the face of fear, defending the vulnerable, embodying authenticity
connection_to_divine.description: How this sign experiences the sacred

home_needs.example: Space for physical activity, minimal clutter, room to spread out, home gym or active area

decorating_style.example: Bold colors, modern and minimal, functional over decorative, statement pieces

location_preferences.example: Urban energy, access to activities, pioneering developments, walkable neighborhoods

relationship_to_space.example: Home base for launching adventures rather than sanctuary; may move frequently; prefers lived-in vs. pristine

seasonal_home_adjustments.example: Summer: outdoor spaces activated; Winter: indoor gym/activity areas; Spring: renovation/new projects; Fall: adventure planning zone

decision_making_style.example: Quick, instinctual, action-first, trusts gut feelings, minimal deliberation

decision_tips.example: Pause to consider 2-3 consequences before acting; write down 'why' before major decisions; consult trusted advisors

when_stuck.example: Take immediate action, any action; analyze later; breaks through by doing; may benefit from short-term timelines

crisis_response.example: Rises to the occasion, becomes more focused and effective under pressure, natural first responder, takes charge

advice_for_major_choices.example: Slow down just enough to consider consequences; channel courage wisely; ensure you're starting what you can finish; seek perspectives from slower signs
